entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
